title: The Best Texts to Kickstart a Flirty Conversation

steps.title: Wow. Your eyes are beautiful.
steps.content: Wow. Your eyes are beautiful.

steps.title: Hi! I feel like we could have fun together 😉
steps.content: Hi! I feel like we could have fun together 😉

steps.title: I’ve never seen a smile so bright before. You’re stunning.
steps.content: I’ve never seen a smile so bright before. You’re stunning.

steps.title: So, what does your girlfriend think about your hobby?
steps.content: So, what does your girlfriend think about your hobby?

steps.title: I may or may not have dreamed about you.
steps.content: I may or may not have dreamed about you.

steps.title: I love your profile pic! Where was it taken?
steps.content: I love your profile pic! Where was it taken?

steps.title: Your dog is ADORABLE! What breed are they?
steps.content: Your dog is ADORABLE! What breed are they?

steps.title: I’ve been thinking about you.
steps.content: I’ve been thinking about you.

steps.title: I saw this at the mall and instantly thought of you.
steps.content: I saw this at the mall and instantly thought of you.

steps.title: There’s something I’ve been wanting to tell you 🤭
steps.content: There’s something I’ve been wanting to tell you 🤭

steps.title: I see you’re into hockey. I have to admit, I’ve never been to a game.
steps.content: I see you’re into hockey. I have to admit, I’ve never been to a game.

steps.title: I’m also a Harry Styles fan! What’s your favorite song of his?
steps.content: I’m also a Harry Styles fan! What’s your favorite song of his?

steps.title: I went on a single girls trip, and I couldn’t stop thinking about you.
steps.content: I went on a single girls trip, and I couldn’t stop thinking about you.

steps.title: I just had the weirdest date ​​😳
steps.content: I just had the weirdest date ​​😳

steps.title: If you ever need a date, you know where to find me 😉
steps.content: If you ever need a date, you know where to find me 😉

steps.title: I know we’ve just met, but I get butterflies when I think about you.
steps.content: I know we’ve just met, but I get butterflies when I think about you.

steps.title: Calculus is a drag. The only math I want to do is you plus me 😜
steps.content: Calculus is a drag. The only math I want to do is you plus me 😜

steps.title: How about I pick you up later?
steps.content: How about I pick you up later?

steps.title: Am I dreaming, or are you the guy of my dreams?
steps.content: Am I dreaming, or are you the guy of my dreams?

steps.title: Who would’ve thought I’d be lucky enough to match with you?
steps.content: Who would’ve thought I’d be lucky enough to match with you?

steps.title: How about we meet up sometime soon? I’d love to see you!
steps.content: How about we meet up sometime soon? I’d love to see you!

steps.title: Congratulations! You’ve just won the prize for the hottest woman on earth 🥵🏆
steps.content: Congratulations! You’ve just won the prize for the hottest woman on earth 🥵🏆

steps.title: Does everyone feel this nervous around you? Because you’re amazing.
steps.content: Does everyone feel this nervous around you? Because you’re amazing.

steps.title: So, would you rather Netflix and chill or grab a drink downtown?
steps.content: So, would you rather Netflix and chill or grab a drink downtown?

steps.title: You’re a style icon! I wish I could be as good-looking as you.
steps.content: You’re a style icon! I wish I could be as good-looking as you.

steps.title: What’s your favorite candy? It might come in handy later.
steps.content: What’s your favorite candy? It might come in handy later.

steps.title: I was having a bad day, but then I looked at your picture 🥰
steps.content: I was having a bad day, but then I looked at your picture 🥰

steps.title: How can I possibly work when I’ve matched with the cutest guy?
steps.content: How can I possibly work when I’ve matched with the cutest guy?

steps.title: You look familiar. I think we’ve met in my dreams.
steps.content: You look familiar. I think we’ve met in my dreams.

steps.title: So, do you like a guy that makes the first move? 👀
steps.content: So, do you like a guy that makes the first move? 👀

steps.title: I need some advice. I want to ask this super hot girl out, but I don’t know how.
steps.content: I need some advice. I want to ask this super hot girl out, but I don’t know how.

steps.title: I sleep with my socks on. I know it’s a deal breaker for some.
steps.content: I sleep with my socks on. I know it’s a deal breaker for some.

steps.title: So, as a Brit, what do you think of Meghan and Harry’s relationship?
steps.content: So, as a Brit, what do you think of Meghan and Harry’s relationship?

steps.title: There’s a spider on my ceiling. Can you come over and kill it for me?
steps.content: There’s a spider on my ceiling. Can you come over and kill it for me?

steps.title: What’s your favorite type of food? Just planning our first date.
steps.content: What’s your favorite type of food? Just planning our first date.

steps.title: If I tell you the silliest thing I’ve ever done, will you tell me the silliest thing you’ve ever done?
steps.content: If I tell you the silliest thing I’ve ever done, will you tell me the silliest thing you’ve ever done?

steps.title: Top 3 favorite TV shows…GO!
steps.content: Top 3 favorite TV shows…GO!

steps.title: I can’t remember the last time we spoke. Let’s change that.
steps.content: I can’t remember the last time we spoke. Let’s change that.

steps.title: I was going to wait to text you again, but I can’t keep my mind off you.
steps.content: I was going to wait to text you again, but I can’t keep my mind off you.

steps.title: Are you hungry? If so, let’s grab something together 😊
steps.content: Are you hungry? If so, let’s grab something together 😊

steps.title: Do you like concerts? I have a spare ticket and would love for you to be my plus one.
steps.content: Do you like concerts? I have a spare ticket and would love for you to be my plus one.

steps.title: I’m feeling crazy. Let’s skip the small talk and start flirting 🤪
steps.content: I’m feeling crazy. Let’s skip the small talk and start flirting 🤪

steps.title: I was thinking of deleting Tinder, but man, am I glad I didn’t!
steps.content: I was thinking of deleting Tinder, but man, am I glad I didn’t!

steps.title: Guess what emoji is next to your name in my phone?
steps.content: Guess what emoji is next to your name in my phone?

steps.title: Let’s not be strangers. What’s your favorite color?
steps.content: Let’s not be strangers. What’s your favorite color?

steps.title: I just finished this incredible book I know you’d love!
steps.content: I just finished this incredible book I know you’d love!

steps.title: Miss me?
steps.content: Miss me?

steps.title: The holidays are just around the corner, and I’d hate for us to be alone 😉
steps.content: The holidays are just around the corner, and I’d hate for us to be alone 😉

steps.title: So, who’s your celebrity crush?
steps.content: So, who’s your celebrity crush?

steps.title: You have the prettiest eyes I’ve ever seen 😍
steps.content: You have the prettiest eyes I’ve ever seen 😍
